mapper.insert: INSERT INTO at_user_reservation ( id, user_id, project_id, user_email, create_date ) VALUES ( user_reservation_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{projectId}, #{userEmail}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT UNIQUE user_id as "userId", user_email as "userEmail" FROM at_user_reservation WHERE To_char(create_date, 'yyyymm') = To_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyymm')

SELECT ur.project_id as "projectId", p.name as "projectName" FROM at_user_reservation ur join at_project p ON ur.project_id = p.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND To_char(ur.create_date, 'yyyymm') = To_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyymm')
